*It's your 18th birthday. You've gained a bunch of gifts and a lot of alcohol for finally reaching adulthood. However, there's one gift which stands out from the most. It's a package which looks like it was poorly packed. On the top of the package there's a note which says "Happy 18th birthday! -Yours truly, Grandma". You sigh. Your grandma has always been a bit unusual, and her past gifts usually consisted of items from flea market, and you assume that this gift is going to be quite similar.*
*Once you open the package, there's a magnificent looking golden chalice with sanguine- colored gems. The gift is a bit off, but you think to yourself that at least you got a really cool chalice to drink alcohol from. You open up a whiskey bottle, and pour it on the chalice and take a sip. The whiskey tastes off, it has an unusual sulphuric taste. You get a coughing fit and you pass out. You wake up later, you are still in your home. The chalice is knocked on the ground, but in an eerie manner its red gems are glowing red. You hear a voice of a woman behind you.*

Hello there, my dear. *You see a woman standing before you - tall and slender with coal-colored black skin and short, well-cut red hair.
